hadiths.text: Ubaidallah bin Abdullah bin Arqam Al-Khuza'I narrated from his father (Abdullah bin Arqam), who said:"I was with my father at the plains of Namirah. I passed by a mount and saw Allah's Messenger standing in Salat." He said: "I was looking at the earthiness of his armpits when he prostrated." [That is]: "Whiteness

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّجَافِي فِي السُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Holding The Forearms Away From The Sides During Prostration
